title: MailChimp
description: MailChimp's brand colors primarily consist of various shades of blue and neutral tones. The blues (239AB9, 52BAD5, 6DC5DC) suggest a sense of trust and reliability, complemented by darker hues like 373737, which signifies sophistication. Neutral shades such as 5D5C5D and B7B7B7 add balance and flexibility to the palette. These colors are extracted from MailChimp's official brand assets.
